reviews.text: Excellent hotel, positive experiences only from here. Rooms were very good, restaurant on the top floor was excellent, spa/massage was very good. Staff and service was excellent.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for business in Tulsa/Pendik area

reviews.text: Somewhat expensive, but that is okay when what you get is top quality.
reviews.title: WOW Experience

reviews.text: Simply put... one of the best hotel experiences I have had in any hotel, in any part of the world.
reviews.title: Good but could be better
Good, comfortable
reviews.text: This hotel is a bit outside Istanbul, but was very close to my business meeting areas.
The check-in process was very smooth. Excellent english speaking staff. Very courteous (This is true for all staff of this hotel).
reviews.title: Outside of city but good for business

reviews.text: All is perfect in this hotel,,reception staf is very good and friendly ,the room is very comfortable,bathroom is luxury,the price is very good ,only location is good only for business ,I have Relaks here , +++++++++++++ excellent hotel
reviews.title: Luxury hotel

reviews.text: Found his hotel very comfortable during a recent business trip. Bedroom was stylish, clean with comfortable beds.
reviews.title: Smart hotel

reviews.text: Only downside for me-

reviews.text: -Climate control in my room was ineffective which made the room uncomfortably warm

reviews.text: -only 1 hand towel and 1 bath towel for my single occupancy, the towels provided were poor quality compared to the general room standard.

reviews.text: Big size rooms, very clean, entertainment pack is great with 40 inch LED at standart rooms, ask for a sea view room, the higher the floor, the better the view.
reviews.title: Best stay at east edge of Istanbul

reviews.text: Breakfast with full selection of cheese etc serves well. There is a nice bar-restaurant on roof. They have dry aged steak alternatives.
reviews.title: surpassed expectations

reviews.text: Comfortable business stay.
reviews.title: Overnight Business Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I picked this hotel due to its proximity to the sabiha gokcen airport. My stay wasn't planned so i didn't know much about the hotel. From my experiences at other divan properties, I went there not expecting too much.However my expectations were surpassed in every aspect. The service was great. Everyone was extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms are very elegant and feel qualitative.
reviews.title: Desperate for business they have to lie!!

reviews.text: However only stay here if you are visiting the pendik, kartal, sabiha gokcen airport area. It is very far from the city center.
reviews.title: Good choice for business in Kartal/Pandik area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 2 nights here after leaving Old Town. We moved here to be closer to SAW airport. It was nice and relaxing and this hotel had the nicest and largest room of our stay and if I remember was the least expensive. The room was on the 12th floor, thus a nice view. Not much to do in this area but we needed the rest after 5 days on the trot in Old Town, Sultanahmet. The Turkish bath was great and just a nice hotel, with a nice roof top restaurant. We had our first meal at the hotel by having dinner on Sat. It was really good – not cheap. Expect US prices. The 2 glasses of wine really took the bill over the top. Next day, it was Sunday and they had a Sunday brunch. Again not cheap but I think worth it. I did not even make it to the main dishes – just the salads, cheeses, sushi (rolls – so really Maki), olives, meats, smoked salmon and on and on. The setting is nice too up on the top floor looking over the sea (Marimas?). The previous night we sat outside but for lunch we sat inside next to a window. Part of my entertainment here was watching the traffic. The freeway right by the Hotel is slightly uphill and curves. So the drivers really cannot see the traffic till they get right there and for some reason it is always backed up right in front of the Hotel (maybe construction ahead). Cars, vans and trucks literally turned around and went the opposite direction while other just backed up. My guess is there must have been an exit behind them. But the chaos, screeching breaks, I did not witness an accident but I am sure there would have been more than one.
reviews.title: Great relaxing stay

reviews.text: By the way if interested in motor sports the F1 track is in the general vicinity.
reviews.title: Excellent Luxury Hotel

reviews.text: A little bit of history. I booked the hotel on-line via the Divan website. I received and e-mail with the confirmation and offering a transfer to/from the airport for 70 Euros. In the meantime I saw on the web site that they offered a free shuttle. Long story short, they followed up and explained to me that this service is no longer available. During the same time I posted to find out how to get to the airport at the Istanbul forum and I was told that it is about 30TL. Turned out it was 25TL with tip came to 30TL. Anyway after checking in – it was all good – I was in the room and clicked on guest services (on the room TV). To quote – you can see the picture too: “Dear Guest, complimentary shuttle service from Hotel to Sabiha Gokcen Airport, Sabiha Gokcen Airport to Hotel at Divan Asia is applied according to the timetable below: Please make your reservation at the reception”.
reviews.title: Very good!

reviews.text: So the next time I went down I asked for the lady that I had communicated with to find out the previous Friday was her last day. I told the guy at the reception that I was aware that there is no free shuttle but informed him that it was showing up on the guest services. His English was not the best and he literally started to argue with me. I told that I was not asking for a free shuttle, just pointing it out. There was another gentleman who I could tell understood what I said but did not want to get involved. I turned to him and asked him if he understood what I was saying, he said he did and thanked me for pointing it out. Now this is meant to be a 5 star hotel and the front desk guy is rude and argumentative because I am pointing out an error in their system!!
reviews.title: A nice hotel but far for tourism

reviews.text: The next day we checked out, the guest services was not corrected at the time we left. During check out I handed a TA sticker (reviewed on tripadvisor.com) and told him about the “free shuttle”. He made quick not of it but not sure if anything has happened.
reviews.title: What should i call this hotel and staffs ???
